page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
I would like to express my thanks to all the children of Hollingbourne School, my fellow teachers and the parents who have given up a great deal of their time in helping us complete this project. I would like to thank in particular, Mrs. M.E. Scragg the school headmistress whose enthusiasm for this project enabled it to get off the ground and Mrs. Holley, Mrs.Harris Mrs. Davison, Mrs. Liddle, Mrs. Fagg, Mrs. Gibson and Mrs. Broughton who gave me so much invaluable assistance during the fieldwork stages.
Mr.K.J.Tomlin July 1985.
